Dress me
Visual change equip â€º The .dressme command is a system that gives you the chance to change your armors or weapon or cloak texture to look like a different grade
*(B-A-S-Dynasty-Icarus textures ONLY)* .

*WARNING:* Full body armors can use ONLY full body armor textures, and half & half tunic and gaiter armor sets can use textures from other armors with same type half & half tunic/gaiters!
After you purchase the dressme, these features are saved to your character and restored when you log back in-game.
